articles.author: Connie Loizos
articles.title: Buy now, pay later . . . for a burrito? - TechCrunch
articles.description: In 2010, a programmer who was mining bitcoin famously made the comically expensive mistake of spending 10,000 bitcoin on two pizzas. As of this writing,
articles.content: In 2010, a programmer who was mining bitcoin famously made the comically expensive mistake of spending 10,000 bitcoin on two pizzas. As of this writing, those coins would be worth $850 million dollar… [+884 chars]
